reviews.text:
Had organised  a program in the banquet with a lot of trust but was really disappointed when it came to the billing part (As we were not clear what the team wanted to convey) Special mention to Management team and one who is in charge in taking care of the event part to be a little more soft and courteous while dealing with the customers as the concerned person was very rude.

Good rooms.. Comfortable stay. But not much value for money. 4500 rupees without complementary breakfast. Few staff needs to be little more professional. I ordered dinner. A staff came with my food. Before he left he said," Sir you will have to pay for this meal in advance, please pay it now as you are under direct billing as per directions from reception.".. Now tell me what kind of a hotel asks for money before you can finish your dinner, when you can make settlements during check out. I don't argue with fools, so I just paid and went ahead to finish my dinner. That's not a big deal but it definitely spoils the mood. Let your guest relax. They are there at your hotel after a hectic business travel -Kaustab Gogoi Room 201,Check out 7 Feb 2024

The location of the hotel is good and it is beautifully decorated as well.
We went there to have our Lunch around 12:10 PM. Sadly, they were not serving lunch at that time and we had to order breakfast items. We ordered 2 chicken sandwich, 1 veg sandwich, 2 masala tea and a fresh watermelon juice. It took 35-40 minutes to prepare and serve the items. And to our surprise, before having our breakfast, a manager came and asked if they liked the food.
I would highly suggest to reduce the serving time and look to serve meals round the clock.

May not belong to any big chain of hotels but it's beautifully maintained, strategically located and well served hotel in the city.
Foods are good n rooms are neat n clean

places_with_reviews.name: Bless Inn Hotel
address: 148/D, Grand Trunk Rd, East End, Baronilpur More, Bardhaman, West Bengal 713103, India

reviews.text:
The hotel's location is great , But a lack of decent parking space due to the location.

The rooms are clean with basic amenities but too small in size.

Good hotel for low budget business travellers. The restaurant below is also a very busy restaurant in weekends and takes time to give room service. Food quality was good.

Thank you for the opportunity to provide feedback on our stay at your hotel. Overall, we had a positive experience and appreciated the accommodations and services provided. However, there are a few areas where we believe there is room for improvement.

Firstly, the check-in process was quite slow and inefficient. There was only one staff member at the front desk, and we had to wait in line for quite some time before being attended to. It would be beneficial to have additional staff members available during peak check-in times to streamline the process and reduce wait times for guests.

Secondly, the cleanliness of our room was not up to our expectations. While the overall condition of the room was satisfactory, we noticed some dust accumulation in corners and on surfaces. It would be great if housekeeping could pay more attention to detail in ensuring a spotless room for guests.

Additionally, we found the noise levels within the hotel to be quite high, especially during the evening. The soundproofing in our room was not very effective, and we could hear conversations and footsteps from adjacent rooms and the hallway. This impacted our sleep quality and overall comfort during our stay.

On a positive note, the hotel staff were generally friendly and helpful. We received prompt assistance when requesting additional amenities and their recommendations for local attractions and restaurants were quite helpful.

Furthermore, the location of the hotel was convenient, with easy access to nearby attractions and transportation options. We appreciated the proximity to popular tourist spots and appreciated the hotel's efforts to provide informational brochures and maps for guests.

In conclusion, while we enjoyed certain aspects of our stay at your hotel, there are areas where improvements can be made. We hope our feedback will be taken into consideration in order to enhance the overall guest experience. Thank you once again for hosting us, and we look forward to seeing the positive changes in the future.
The rooms are very well equipped, though the blankets and comforters are old and dirty, also the breakfast menu is very short on items and availability

The hotel is really awesome from both inside and outside. One of the best in the entire bardhaman town. Location wise also, it's in a prime spot, right on the GT Road, and also well connected to the bardhaman railway station.
The rooms are very high quality with almost everything at your service from AC to 24hr geyser to hair drier.
There is a restaurant attached to it as well for refreshment.
But the place is costly and not affordable for everyone. And also the attendants are very reluctant to give you room even if the entire inn is empty. They try to shoo away the customers needing room,even if there are ample rooms unoccupied, don't know why.
They switch off all lights at night and lock the main door from inside which could be tricky for people coming from any occasion in the middle of the night.
As a whole it's a good place if you have money and if you have cache to get the rooms booked, cz for ordinary people going to book rooms, they ALWAYS SAY NO.
All service are very good. No problem and no any complen about there service. I recommendations for that hotel.

reviews.text: The buffet is satisfactory at the price range, but the service is slow. Restaurant food is over priced and quality is average. Unlike some other buffets, this place did not compromise on the taste or variety of the main course items. Apart from the mutton, which was average, everything else was delicious and satisfying. I would highly recommend the buffet here for 699/- as it is a worthwhile experience.
